jenes.stage.operator.common

Class DeterministicCrowder<T extends Chromosome>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenes.stage.AbstractStage<T>
      • jenes.stage.operator.Operator<T>
        • jenes.stage.operator.Crowder<T>
          • jenes.stage.operator.common.DeterministicCrowder<T>

  • public class DeterministicCrowder<T extends Chromosome>
extends Crowder<T>
    This class implements the deterministic crowding.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0

      • setBiggerIsBetter

        @Deprecated
public void setBiggerIsBetter(boolean flag,
                                boolean recursively)
        Deprecated. 
        Overrides:
        setBiggerIsBetter in class Crowder<T extends Chromosome>
        Parameters:
        flag - true, if the best individual has the higher fitness
        recursively - true, to propagate this setting down, otherwise false.
